thread.title: Cooler and more efficient: The Lenovo ThinkStation P900 beat Dell and HP solutions in hands-on tests
thread.title_full: Cooler and more efficient: The Lenovo ThinkStation P900 beat Dell and HP solutions in hands-on tests

author: admin
title: Cooler and more efficient: The Lenovo ThinkStation P900 beat Dell and HP solutions in hands-on tests
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 3:00 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Principled Technologies 
DURHAM, NC--(Marketwired - October 22, 2015) - Power-efficient workstations can save your business in two big ways: on the electricity required to run the machines as well as the power needed to cool your office. Principled Technologies pit the Lenovo ThinkStation P900 against the HP Z840 Workstation and Dell Precision Tower 7910 Workstation and found that the ThinkStation P900 ran cooler and used less power. 
To learn more about how you can save with the cool and efficient ThinkStation P900, read the full reports at facts.pt/1MSuWfk and facts.pt/1MSvqBX . 
About Principled Technologies, Inc. 
Principled Technologies, Inc. is the leading provider of technology marketing and learning & development services. 
Principled Technologies, Inc. is located in Durham, North Carolina, USA. For more information, please visit www.principledtechnologies.com .
